Texto: 
unavailable.
cxr and ct demonstrate nodular interstitial lung disease with multiple superimposed pulmonary masses/nodules. significant mediastinal and hilar lymphadenopathy are seen. numerous splenic and renal nodules are also present.
sarcoid
sarcoid
lymphoma
lymphangitic carcinomatosis
36 year-old caucasian man with worsening shortness of breath, exercise intolerance and fatigue. referred to pulmonary for evaluation.
